intro: Viburnum tinus var. lucidum, commonly known as the glossy leaf viburnum, is a compact evergreen shrub native to the Mediterranean region. It features dark green, glossy leaves that provide year-round visual interest. The plant produces small, fragrant white flowers in early spring, which are followed by bright red berries that attract birds. It is well-suited for container gardening and can thrive in partial shade to full sun. Its dense foliage and ornamental berries make it a popular choice for ornamental landscaping.
